TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed Dns extends System.Object
public ref class Dns abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供简单的域名解析功能。

span.span: Provides simple domain name resolution functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个静态类，从 Internet 域名系统 (DNS) 中检索有关特定主机的信息。The class is a static class that retrieves information about a specific host from the Internet Domain Name System (DNS). DNS 查询中的主机信息返回实例中类。The host information from the DNS query is returned in an instance of the class. 如果指定的主机在 DNS 数据库中有多个条目包含多个 IP 地址和别名。If the specified host has more than one entry in the DNS database, contains multiple IP addresses and aliases. ## Examples 下面的示例查询 DNS 数据库中的主机 www.contoso.com 上的信息。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static IAsyncResult BeginGetHostAddresses (string hostNameOrAddress, AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetHostAddresses(string hostNameOrAddress, class System.AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state) cil managed
Public Shared Function BeginGetHostAddresses (hostNameOrAddress As String, requestCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: static IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetHostAddresses(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress, AsyncCallback ^ requestCallback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 requestCallback 委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.

summary.span: 异步返回指定主机的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址。

span.span: Asynchronously returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host.

returns.span: 引用异步请求的 实例。

span.span: An instance that references the asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法异步查询是与主机名关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses that are associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 如果作为传递空字符串`hostNameOrAddress`自变量，则此方法返回的本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以异步方式将查询 DNS 服务器 IP 地址以及与 IP 地址相关联的别名。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. **请注意**时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员发出跟踪信息。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询与主机名称关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. **请注意**时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员发出跟踪信息。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`requestCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询与主机名关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果作为传递空字符串`hostNameOrAddress`自变量，则此方法返回的本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法受到阻止，直到操作完成。This method blocks until the operation is complete. 若要以同步方式执行此操作，使用方法。To perform this operation synchronously, use the method. 如果属性设置为`true`、属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法受到阻止，直到操作完成。This method blocks until the operation is complete. 如果设置为`true`、属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。If the is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. 若要以同步方式执行此操作，使用方法。To perform this operation synchronously, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例结束对 DNS 主机信息的异步请求。The following example ends an asynchronous request for DNS host information. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询与主机名关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 地址，而无需查询 DNS 服务器返回此地址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果作为传递空字符串`hostNameOrAddress`自变量，则此方法返回的本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 从结果中筛选 IPv6 地址方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空实例如果仅 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`实例。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以将 IP 地址解析为类型的数组。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an array of type . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询主机信息的 Internet DNS 服务器。The method queries the Internet DNS server for host information. 如果您的主机名称传入空字符串，则此方法检索本地计算机的标准的主机名。If you pass an empty string as the host name, this method retrieves the standard host name for the local computer. DNS 信息异步访问，请使用和方法。For asynchronous access to DNS information, use the and methods. 如果属性设置为`true`、属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以获取指定的 DNS 主机名的 DNS 信息。The following example uses the method to get the DNS information for the specified DNS host name. [!code-cpp[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/CPP/dns_gethostbyname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/CS/dns_gethostbyname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_GetHostByName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostByName/VB/dns_gethostbyname.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将查询 DNS 服务器 IP 地址以及与 IP 地址相关联的别名。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. 从结果中筛选 IPv6 地址方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空实例如果仅 IPv6 结果可用于`address`参数。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#4)]

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询与主机名称关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果作为传递空字符串`hostNameOrAddress`自变量，则此方法返回的本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到的主机名，异常返回值为 11001 （Windows 套接字错误 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND）。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 服务器不响应，则可能会返回此异常。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名称不是正式的主机名或别名，或者找不到它正在查询的数据库中，可能还会返回此异常。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 异常，也会返回如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 方法假定如果传入 IP 文字字符串`hostNameOrAddress`希望应用程序的参数实例返回所有属性集。The method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 这些属性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 因此的实现方法传递 IP 字符串文本时出现以下行为：As a result, the implementation of the method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 该方法尝试分析地址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含合法 IP 字符串文本，则第一阶段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字符串文本的 IP 地址的反向查找尝试获取的主机名。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此结果集作为属性。This result is set as the property. 3. 再次使用主机名从此反向查找以获取所有可能的 IP 地址与名称关联并将设置为属性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. 为 IPv4 字符串文本，以上所有三个步骤可能会成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但有可能属于不同的主机返回实际的 IPv4 地址的陈旧 DNS 记录。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 这可能导致步骤 #3 失败并引发的异常 （不存在 DNS PTR 记录的 IPv4 地址，但任何 DNS A 记录的 IPv4 地址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). 对于 IPv6，# 上述步骤 2 可能会失败，因为大多数 IPv6 部署并注册的 IPv6 地址的反向 (PTR) 记录。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此，此方法可能返回的字符串 IPv6 文字中的完全限定域名 (FQDN) 主机名作为属性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有不同的行为时会 IP 文本。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上面的步骤 1 成功 （它已成功分析作为 IP 地址），因此立即返回地址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不会尝试在反向查找。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. 从结果中筛选 IPv6 地址方法如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空实例如果仅 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`实例。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#1)]

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后`address`已得到解决。The returned object will complete after the `address` has been resolved. 此方法将查询 DNS 服务器 IP 地址以及与 IP 地址相关联的别名。This method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. 如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6，则此方法的结果从会筛选 IPv6 地址。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空实例如果仅 IPv6 结果可用于`address`参数。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: is .
An error is encountered when resolving .

exception.span: 是无效的 IP 地址。

span.span: is an invalid IP address.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync (string hostNameOrAddress);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync(string hostNameOrAddress) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHostEntryAsync (hostNameOrAddress As String) As Task(Of IPHostEntry)
public: static System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::Net::IPHostEntry ^> ^ GetHostEntryAsync(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress);

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

summary.span: 将主机名或 IP 地址解析为 实例以作为异步操作。

span.span: Resolves a host name or IP address to an instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 返回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回 实例，该实例包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后`hostNameOrAddress`已得到解决。The returned object will complete after the `hostNameOrAddress` has been resolved. 此方法将查询与主机名称关联的 IP 地址或 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。This method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果作为传递空字符串`hostNameOrAddress`自变量，则此方法返回的本地主机的 IPv4 和 IPv6 地址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到的主机名，异常返回值为 11001 （Windows 套接字错误 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND）。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 服务器不响应，则可能会返回此异常。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名称不是正式的主机名或别名，或者找不到它正在查询的数据库中，可能还会返回此异常。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 异常，也会返回如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 此方法假定如果传入 IP 文字字符串`hostNameOrAddress`希望应用程序的参数实例返回所有属性集。This method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 这些属性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 因此，此方法的实现具有以下行为，这是传递 IP 字符串时：As a result, the implementation of this method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 该方法尝试分析地址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`参数包含合法 IP 字符串文本，则第一阶段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字符串文本的 IP 地址的反向查找尝试获取的主机名。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此结果集作为属性。This result is set as the property. 3. 再次使用主机名从此反向查找以获取所有可能的 IP 地址与名称关联并将设置为属性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. 为 IPv4 字符串文本，以上所有三个步骤可能会成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但有可能属于不同的主机返回实际的 IPv4 地址的陈旧 DNS 记录。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 这可能导致步骤 #3 失败并引发的异常 （不存在 DNS PTR 记录的 IPv4 地址，但任何 DNS A 记录的 IPv4 地址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). 对于 IPv6，# 上述步骤 2 可能会失败，因为大多数 IPv6 部署并注册的 IPv6 地址的反向 (PTR) 记录。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此，此方法可能返回的字符串 IPv6 文字中的完全限定域名 (FQDN) 主机名作为属性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有不同的行为时会 IP 文本。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上面的步骤 1 成功 （它已成功分析作为 IP 地址），因此立即返回地址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不会尝试在反向查找。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. 如果本地计算机没有安装 IPv6，则此方法的结果从会筛选 IPv6 地址。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 因此，很可能返回一个空实例如果仅 IPv6 结果可用于`hostNameOrAddress`实例。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 获取本地计算机的主机名。

span.span: Gets the host name of the local computer.

returns.span: 包含本地计算机的 DNS 主机名的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取本地计算机的主机名。The following example uses the method to obtain the host name of the local computer. [!code-cpp[Dns_GetHostName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostName/CPP/dns_gethostname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_GetHostName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostName/CS/dns_gethostname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_GetHostName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_GetHostName/VB/dns_gethostname.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve (string hostName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve(string hostName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Resolve (hostName As String) As IPHostEntry
public: static System::Net::IPHostEntry ^ Resolve(System::String ^ hostName);

param.name: hostName
param.span: DNS 样式的主机名或 IP 地址。

span.span: A DNS-style host name or IP address.

summary.span: 将 DNS 主机名或 IP 地址解析为 实例。

span.span: Resolves a DNS host name or IP address to an instance.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含有关 中指定的主机的地址信息。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查询与主机名或 IP 地址关联的 IP 地址的 DNS 服务器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address associated with a host name or IP address. 当`hostName`与多个 IP 地址关联的 DNS 样式主机名，则返回仅为第一个 IP 地址解析为该主机名。When `hostName` is a DNS-style host name associated with multiple IP addresses, only the first IP address that resolves to that host name is returned. 如果属性设置为`true`、属性返回实例不填充此方法，且将始终为空。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 在你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪时，此成员将发出跟踪信息。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以解析 IP 地址为实例。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CPP/dns_resolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CS/dns_resolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/VB/dns_resolve.vb#1)]
